sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The description of a monstrous pig the which was farrowed at Hamsted besyde London, the. xvi. day of October this present yeare of our Lord God. M.D.LXII.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
By Alexander Lacy for Garat Devves, dwellyng in Poules church yarde, at the East end of the Church, Imprinted at London : [1562]
Woodcut with letterpress prose description--STC. Formerly also STC 12737. "UMI copy reel 1022 is actually the Bodleian Library copy."--STC. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Poules church yarde, at the East end of the Church
